page.title: 09Employment in Shenstone
page.content: I don't no how many unemployed there are in Shenstone, I expect there are a few but I know the majority of working people go out of the village to work. There aren't many places in Shenstone to work. Most of the shop owners live in Shenstone, only a couple live out of the village, but most of the teachers live out of the village, only one lives in the village. If the plans for more development go ahead, will Shenstone become a dormatory? I asked 7 people if there mums and dads work in the village. The majority did say there mums and dads worked out of the village. A couple of mums don't work. This is a chart of the 7 couples I asked. PEOPLE THAT WORK IN THE VILLAGE: 4 PEOPLE THAT DON'T WORK IN THE VILLAGE: 7 PEOPLE THAT DON'T WORK: 3. J.BASS
